messages.message:
*SDK bug/poor UX*
I have a workaround for this, but it feels silly to make the user running the SDK do this String conversion:
When calling the `client.apps.runs.delete(batch.id)` endpoint, it errors out because `batch.id` is stored as an _Int_, and the delete endpoint is expecting a _String_.
Ideally, the SDK would be updated to attempt to typecast the batch id as a _String_ in case the user didn't think to do so.

Full error:
```---------------------------------------------------------------------------
ValidationError                           Traceback (most recent call last)
Cell In[6], line 1
----> 1 resp = client.apps.runs.delete(batch.id,
      2                                delete_db_data = False,
      3                                delete_input = True,
      4                                delete_output = True,
      5                                delete_logs = False)
      6 job_ids = [
      7     resp.delete_input_dir_job_id,
      8     resp.delete_output_dir_job_id,
      9     resp.delete_log_dir_job_id
     10 ]
     11 # Poll for job completion

File /Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.13/lib/python3.13/site-packages/aihub/aihub.py:275, in AIHub.Runs.delete(self, run_id, delete_db_data, delete_input, delete_output, delete_logs)
    269 def delete(self,
    270            run_id,
    271            delete_db_data=True,
    272            delete_input=True,
    273            delete_output=True,
    274            delete_logs=True):
--> 275   response = self.api_instance.delete_run(
    276       run_id,
    277       delete_db_data=delete_db_data,
    278       delete_input=delete_input,
    279       delete_output=delete_output,
    280       delete_logs=delete_logs,
    281       ib_context=self.ib_context)
    282   return response

File /Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.13/lib/python3.13/site-packages/pydantic/validate_call_decorator.py:60, in validate_call.<locals>.validate.<locals>.wrapper_function(*args, **kwargs)
     58 @functools.wraps(function)
     59 def wrapper_function(*args, **kwargs):
---> 60     return validate_call_wrapper(*args, **kwargs)

File /Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.13/lib/python3.13/site-packages/pydantic/_internal/_validate_call.py:96, in ValidateCallWrapper.__call__(self, *args, **kwargs)
     95 def __call__(self, *args: Any, **kwargs: Any) -> Any:
---> 96     res = self.__pydantic_validator__.validate_python(pydantic_core.ArgsKwargs(args, kwargs))
     97     if self.__return_pydantic_validator__:
     98         return self.__return_pydantic_validator__(res)

ValidationError: 1 validation error for delete_run
1
  Input should be a valid string [type=string_type, input_value=60956, input_type=int]
    For further information visit https://errors.pydantic.dev/2.9/v/string_type```
